name: H.A.R. VEST
description:
Short Puzzle Platformer where the goal is to get to the end of each room while using as little energy as you can to increase your score. Aim for a high ranking at the end of the level!

- Story -
Jason was a scientist working for a brilliant tech laboratory developing a new kind of advanced artifical intelligence that could be fully self-taught.

One day, when the newest prototype, the H.A.R. VEST, was nearly completed, he decided to steal it and escape the lab for his own personal interests.

Now, Jason and the H.A.R. VEST must work together to not get caught in the lab's security traps! The vest has the remarkable ability to absorb energy and use it in a variety of ways. Can this unlikely duo make it to the end?

- Controls -
Play using keyboard or controller!

Arrow Keys / D-Pad / Control Stick - Move

Z / South Button - Jump / Air Dash

X / West Button - Single Shot

C / North Button - Lightning Shot

V / East Button - Teleport

R / back Button - Reset Room

Made for Ludum Dare 52 - Harvest.
Vote here: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/52/h-a-r-vest

By Poko, Breaddysticks, HyperO and Gab
